column2: Strategy: Develop visual content strategies that align with and propel our marketing initiatives, fostering stronger brand recognition, customer engagement and education. Content Creation: Capture, produce, and edit photographs and videos for a wide range of purposes including brand promotions, educational videos, performance marketing, and social media content. Event Coverage: Attend and capture key company events, product & clinic launches, and other important occasions, ensuring high-quality documentation of these moments. Travel may be required to various event locations. Brand Alignment: Ensure all visual content aligns with our brand identity, design guidelines, messaging, and marketing goals, maintaining consistency across all media. Collaboration: Work closely with the marketing team to plan and execute content strategies, ensuring that all visual materials meet the needs of targeted campaigns and initiatives. Innovation and Trends: Stay updated with the latest trends in photography, videography, and social media to create innovative and trendsetting visual content. Post-Production: Handle all aspects of post-production, from editing images and videos to adding graphics and effects that enhance the final output. Equipment Maintenance: Manage and maintain photography and videography equipment, ensuring all tools are in working order and up-to-date. Project Management: Manage multiple projects from conception through completion, meeting deadlines and coordinating with other team members and stakeholders. Asset Management: Organize and maintain a digital asset management system, ensuring all photo and video materials are properly cataloged, stored, and easily accessible for current and future use.
column11: Photography, videography, photoshop, social media, project management, Videographer, digital asset management, video editor, equipment maintenance, post production, content creation

column2: Support the Carrier MDM team in the implementation of the company-wide Data Policies and Governance Framework      Business partner to the Digital Technology function to define and deliver and Modelling strategy      Develop documentation and education materials to support business stakeholders and imbed Master Data Management best practices      Foster a continuous improvement and boundaries      Build working relationships and foster communication with internal customers within and across organizational and geographic boundaries      Manage multiple complex assignments including the ability to plan, assign and direct work in a dynamic environment with changing priorities              Requirements          Post-Graduation in Business Administration, Accounting, required (i.e. system configuration knowledge), including experience with their implementation, in particular with data management platforms (e.g. Alation, Atlan, Collibra, )      Experience in up to senior management      Experience in process and Data improvement, applying root cause analysis      Experience in MDM application systems (preferably SAP MDG)      Experience in building reports/dashboards using DA tools (SAC, Azure, Alteryx, SQL, PowerBI)      Experience in complex IT system environments      Experience in complex business environments      Understanding of external cross-functional teams and across the different functions.      Keeps deadlines and produces high quality output      Fosters a constructive dialogue within process owners, BU/Functions and other key stakeholders      Strong communicator and change agent      Ability to utilize metrics to identify opportunities for service improvement      Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills      Customer service mind-set and skills      International mind-set - sensible for cultural differences
column11: Have a good taste in videographer

column2: At Indiahikes, we conduct multiple treks in the Himalayas throughout the year. We are looking for a skilled Drone Videographer to capture these treks from a bird s eye view.      For this role, you should ideally be someone with prior experience handling a drone in the mountains. You also need some basic trekking experience to anticipate the challenges of flying a drone on treks.      If you ve handled a drone at high altitude, thats great! But even if you have experience handling a drone on a local trek in the Western Ghats or Sahyadris, we d love to get to know you.      Please note that you ll need your own drone to apply for this role.        Your Responsibilities:          Shoot drone videos to show the landscape of a Himalayan trek      Define a clear plan of action with a timeline for such shoots in collaboration with Indiahikes leaders      Ensure the availability of all equipment required for the shoots      If required, remotely guide other photographers and videographers to gather such footage on other treks          What you need to come with:          Your own drone with a 4K resolution      Proficiency in video editing software like Premiere Pro and After Effects      Good interpersonal skills to collaborate with various team members      Good fitness is needed to trek in the Himalayas to conduct such shoots

Capture and edit high-quality photos and videos for various projects and campaigns.     Collaborate with the creative team to develop concepts and ideas for photo and video content.     Set up and operate photography and videography equipment, including cameras, lighting, and audio devices.     Organize and manage digital assets, including photos, videos, and other multimedia content.     Edit and retouch photos and videos to ensure high-quality and visually appealing final products.     Create video content for social media, websites, and other digital platforms.     Contribute creative ideas for visual storytelling and content development.     Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and techniques in photography, videography, and video editing.     Maintain and organize photography and videography equipment and studio space.     Support the team with various administrative tasks related to photography, videography, and video editing projects.         Candidate Requirements:         Bachelors degree in Photography, Film Studies, Media Production, or related field preferred.     1-3 years of professional experience in Photography and Videography. Prior experience in an agency will be an add-on.     Candidate is required to bring their own DSLR camera or any other equivalent professional grade camera.     Proficiency in using photography and videography equipment (DSLR cameras, lighting, audio devices).     Experience with video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc).     Strong portfolio demonstrating photography and videography skills.     Basic understanding of composition, lighting, and visual storytelling.     Attention to detail and aesthetic sensibility.     Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team.
column11: Photography, Administration, Adobe Premiere Pro, Videography, Social media, Video editing, Management, Content development
